EmailTemplate.name: OptIn_Program_mih.AERO_Confirmation_DoubleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Please confirm your subscription.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SUBSCRIPTION CONFIRMATION Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to {{lead.Signup:default=Honeywell Aerospace}} e-communications.* Please click the button below to confirm your subscription.
YES, SUBSCRIBE ME. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation.html]]>
If you received this email by mistake, simply delete it. You won’t be subscribed if you do not click the confirmation link above.
Thank you!
Honeywell Aerospace
*E-communications refers to email, social media and digital advertising.
You can unsubscribe from our email communications at any time. To unsubscribe, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Unsubscribe_Confirmation.html]]>.
